|cpu1chip1 = Netlogic Microsystems;Alchemy Au1550; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->

|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Smart Card Reader chip is attached via a daughterboard.
"Xtreme PC EX-NG Main Board Rev. D1" and "CPC04267" is silkscreened under daughterboard.
==Pictures== <center>'''[[User:RayKnight|RayKnight]]'s unit''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:EX7552NG-3.JPG File:EX7552NG-5.JPG File:EX7552NG-2.JPG File:EX7552NG-4.JPG File:EX7552NG-1.JPG </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
